title: What will happen to my life if I don't go to school? - Quora

response.answer_text: That is entirely up to you.  George Boole only had a primary education but he read and taught himself about complex mathematics and sought out others who could mentor him. He went on to create Boolean equations, some of the most important mathematics in modern history. Warren Buffet only has a highschool education and has become one of the richest men in the world. If you are : intelligent, highly motivated, know the difference between schooling and learning, hard working and are a bit lucky, you may be fine. If you are like the other 99% of people, you are going to need a certificate from an educational body to get a job. In the real world, employers want qualifications.

It will be the biggest loss of one's life …, and also this era is in need of literate ones and if in this case children's won't go to school then it would be the biggest loss of the nation and also our own self. So it's very necessary to go to school…….
